name: Number Link - Bridges
description:
Number Link - Bridges, is an simple but addictive game. We well-design 3983 puzzle levels, although the game size is around 3 megabyte, we believe it will bring you over 3 hours' interesting time.

Drawing one line to connect two black circles under same number;
The draw lines always can not be crossed; but now can be crossed under the bridge.
The draw lines should pass all gray grids.

If you are interested in this game, please give us some good reviews, and check our other puzzle games in https://itunes.apple.com/us/developer/an-zhuona/id1262294397

More feedbacks, please email to azhuona@gmail.com
